name: Xiaolumi Hangout
description:
⟣. · ·.   Introduction  . · ·. ⟢

This is a fanmade Visual Novel game featuring characters from Genshin Impact. This game focuses on the romantic ship of Xiao and Lumine, known as Xiaolumi in the fandom.

The game is currently under development. There are 3 routes/endings available with 3 more to come in the future, for a total of 6 routes.

⟣. · ·.   Synopsis  . · ·. ⟢

Lumine, a traveler from beyond the stars, yearns for a moment of respite from her long and often arduous journey. Visiting the familiar lands of Liyue once more, Lumine seeks the Guardian Yaksha whose company brings her comfort. 

Yet this is not only for her sake. Without ever asking for anything in return, Xiao always offers everything he has. He, too, deserves a moment of peace which Lumine is ever so willing to provide.

⟣. · ·.   Content  . · ·. ⟢

▶ 3 Routes/Endings available (6 planned)

▶ Roughly 2 hours of playtime (for all 3 endings)

▶ Includes unique CGs and original sprites for Xiao and Lumine

▶ Age Rating: 12+

▶ Content Warnings: mentions of Xiao's traumatic past, but it doesn't go into detail

⟣. · ·.   Q & A  . · ·. ⟢

1. Is this game free?

Yes. The game is free and I accept no payment for it as I've used several assets belonging to HoYoverse to create it. If you wish to support my original content, find me on Twitter or other platforms.

2. When will this game be finished?

I do not have a specific date to offer because this is a hobby project I make in my free time. I would also like to first receive feedback and see whether people enjoy it and want to more of it, which is why I'm releasing it as a beta version or early access, if you will.

3. Who is this game for?

It's for people who like Xiao, Lumine and/or Xiaolumi and want to see them in some fun, fluffy and lighthearted scenarios. Future routes may or may not include darker content. Age rating and content warnings will be updated accordingly.

4. Will you make a version with Aether?

Unfortunately, no. Aether is cool, but I picked Lumine as my Traveler so I'm only interested in making stories from Traveler Lumine's point of view. Also, I'm simply a fan of Xiaolumi.     

5. Will this game be available on iOS in the future?

I don't know. I will look into it but I can't make any promises on whether an iOS release will happen.

⟣. · ·.  ◇  . · ·. ⟢

HoYoverse please don't sue me, I just like Xiaolumi. 😔
